text.title: my solo trip to the swiss alps

only good morning from
Switzerland already have these
absolutely insane views and I haven't

strong start it's currently the bank
holiday weekend in August so I planned a
super last minute trip to go hiking
because I missed it I'm about to do more
of a descent hike today just because I
haven't been elevation hiking in a long
time and I don't really have my hiking
legs anymore so I want to ensure I have
the stamina to be hiking all 3 days I'm
here there's a really famous mountain

I swear everywhere I turn is more

a single-handedly the most scenic spot
I've ever eaten a cliff bar in my life
I've reached the Peak mountain hut and I
just chilled relaxed for a little bit
and now I'm going to begin my descent
down to the lake so I can go for a
little swim the whole reason I actually
came on this trip was a I like to do at
least one solo trip a year I've been
doing it for the past like four or so
years and I just think they're really
fun and a good way to kind of reconnect
with yourself and the second reason was
because I was kind of missing home so
I'm from Seattle the mountains the Lakes
the nature is just absolutely stunning
and it's something that you just really
can't replicate unless you're in the
mountains and I live in London which is
a city and it's flat so decided to book
myself a little trip to Switzerland
which is a crazy thing that I'm able to
do in the third reason is it was a
promotion gift to myself I got a
promotion at work so I decided to go on
a trip to celebrate and so now I'm
eating snacks in the Swiss Els
